definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: And the velocity of slow compressional-wave(P-wave) is in direct proportion to the porosity and the density of fluid.
sentences.chinese: 而慢縱波的速度則和孔隙度和流體的密度成正比。

sentences.english: In Zhenzhong Qu, longitudinal wave to the ground moving from top to bottom Britain.
sentences.chinese: 在震中區，縱波使地面上下顛動。

sentences.english: This paper discuses the problem of application of the longitudinal waves to layered dielectric waveguides.
sentences.chinese: 討論在分層介質波導中採用縱波的問題。

sentences.english: And the phase velocity of fast wave will decrease exponentially with frequency.
sentences.chinese: 快縱波的相速度隨頻率的增大以指數形式減小。
